$$
\text{Memoria musical}_i= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \varepsilon_i
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
H_0: & \beta_{expertise} = 0 \\
H_a: & \beta_{expertise} \neq 0
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{expertise=10} = & \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \times 10\\
= & 20.86 + 0.23 \times 10 \\
= & 23.16
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\mathbf{1}_A \colon X \rightarrow \{ 0, 1 \}
$$

$$
\mathbf{1}_A\!( x ) = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if } x \in A \\
0 & \text{if } x \notin A \,.
\end{cases}
$$
$$
\mathbf{1}_{male}\!( x ) = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if } x = male \\
0 & \text{if } x \neq male \,.
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\text{Memoria visual}_i= \beta_0 + \beta_{sexo} \mathbf{1}_{male_i} + \varepsilon_i
$$

$$
\mathbf{1}_{male}\!( x_i ) = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if } x_i = male \\
0 & \text{if } x_i \neq male
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{sex=female}= 8.631 + 0.295 \times 0 = 8.631
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{sex=male}= 8.631 + 0.295 \times 1 = 8.926
$$

$$
\text{Memoria visual}_i= \beta_0 + \beta_{Germany} \mathbf{1}_{Germany_i} + \beta_{Italy} \mathbf{1}_{Italy_i} + \varepsilon_i
$$

$$
\mathbf{1}_{Germany}\!( x_i ) = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if } x_i = Germany \\
0 & \text{if } x_i \neq Germany 
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\mathbf{1}_{Italy}\!( x_i ) = \begin{cases}
1 & \text{if } x_i = Italy \\
0 & \text{if } x_i \neq Italy
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{Finland} = \beta_0 + \beta_{Germany} \mathbf{1}_{Germany} + \beta_{Italy} \mathbf{1}_{Italy}
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{Finland} = \beta_0 + \beta_{Germany} \times 0 + \beta_{Italy} \times 0 = \beta_0 = 9.62
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{Germany} = \beta_0 + \beta_{Germany} \times 1 + \beta_{Italy} \times 0 = \beta_0 = 8.86
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria visual}}_{Italy} = \beta_0 + \beta_{Germany} \times 0 + \beta_{Italy} \times 1 = \beta_0 = 8.37
$$
$$
\begin{align*}
H_0 &: \beta_{Germany} = \beta_{Italy} = 0 \\
H_a &: \text{al menos un } \beta_j \neq 0
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\text{Memoria musical}_i &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \beta_{nonmusician} \mathbf{1}_{nonmusician_i} + \\
& + \beta_{int} \text{Años de formación}_i \times \mathbf{1}_{nonmusician_i} + \varepsilon_i
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{nonmusician} &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \beta_{nonmusician_i} \times 1 + \\
& + \beta_{int} \text{Años de formación}_i \times 1  = \\
 &= (\beta_0+\beta_{nonmusician}) + (\beta_{expertise} + \beta_{int})  \text{Años de formación}_i = \\
 &= (23.55 - 3.21) + (0.25 - 0.17) \text{Años de formación}_i = \\
 &= 20.34 + 0.08 \text{Años de formación}_i
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{nonmusician} &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \beta_{nonmusician_i} \times 1 + \\
& + \beta_{int} \text{Años de formación}_i \times 1  = \\
 &= (\beta_0+\beta_{nonmusician}) + (\beta_{expertise} + \beta_{int})  \text{Años de formación}_i
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{nonmusician} =  (\beta_0+\beta_{nonmusician}) + (\beta_{expertise} + \beta_{int})  \text{Años de formación}_i
$$
$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{nonmusician} = 20.34 + 0.08 \text{Años de formación}_i
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{musician} &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \beta_{nonmusician_i} \times 0 + \\
& + \beta_{int} \text{Años de formación}_i \times 0  = \\
 &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i = \\
 &= 23.55  + 0.25  \text{Años de formación}_i
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{musician} &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i + \beta_{nonmusician_i} \times 0 + \\
& + \beta_{int} \text{Años de formación}_i \times 0  = \\
 &= \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\widehat{\text{Memoria musical}}_{musician} = \beta_0 + \beta_{expertise} \text{Años de formación}_i
$$
